entries.name: breakable(sep=' ', width=nil)
entries.desc: Appends sep to the text to be output. By default sep is ' '

entries.name: first?()
entries.desc: This is used as a predicate, and ought to be called first.

entries.name: group(indent=nil, open_obj='', close_obj='', open_width=nil, close_width=nil)
entries.desc: Opens a block for grouping objects to be pretty printed.

entries.name: text(obj, width=nil)
entries.desc: Add obj to the text to be output.
